ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] New Instruments?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello. Allakhazams.com has a very good section on their site dedicated to the Twilight Armor quests - even telling you what to kill to get each piece. Also, I
ygData.messageBody:
Hello. Allakhazams.com has a very good section on
their site dedicated to the Twilight Armor quests
- even telling you what to kill to get each
piece.

Also, I picked up an Ivory Horn at the Vendor in
Luclin (think in Shar Vahl) which adds +2
charisma, but I don't know if it has any
additional bonuses or not. If anyone does know,
please post.

--- Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
> Does anyone know of any new instruments on
> Luclin?
> Also, does anyone want to add Twilight armour
> info to the FAQ, or should I leave that to them
> to research?



=====
Kinrea Keres 52nd Teir'dal Champion
Danallis Stormcaller 40th Half Elven Druid
Sinarya L'achesis 29th Teir'dal Necromancer
Lereny 16th Half Elven Bard
Pippina 7th Vah Shir Beastlord

Saryrn Server
